outputs.output_descr: The expected outcome of this project is initiation of  a systematic and sustainable approach to assessing global environmental achievements through the implementation of  national policies, programmes and plans.  This project will also be an important contribution to the national experiences in developing and implementing tools and practices for measuring, reporting, and verifying the cost-effectiveness of official development assistance to implementing multilateral environmental agreements, in particular the Rio Conventions.

project_descr: Capacity building for integration of global environment commitments in investment/development decisions. Objective is to capacitate National partners for establishment and operations of an indicator based environmental information system.
project_title: Environmental Indicators and Information System, MNE
